title: Animal Crossing Sales Surpass Mario and Zelda  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.21.20
description:
It's NPD day and you know what that means! Blessing and Imran talk about what an amazing sales month for Animal Crossing: New Horizons means for the franchise. 

Time  Stamps - 
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
Thursday night at 7 pm PT, we’re having the social event of the season: Grimecraft’s Kinda Funny Animal Crossing Rave! That’s right, Grimecraft will be DJing a set in Animal Crossing for the Kinda Funny Best Friends. You can watch live -- and catch Greg interviewing Grimey after the show -- on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. But even better, you can come to the concert IN Animal Crossing. Keep an eye on Kinda Funny’s Twitter Thursday afternoon, and you can find out how to visit Grimecraft’s island and get the exclusive in-game t-shirt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:03:30 - March 2020 NPD is out, and video games are selling like hot cakes - Jeff Grubb @ Venture Beat
00:12:10 - NPD! - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:16:20 - Final Fantasy VII Remake Moves 3.5 Million Copies in Three Days Making it one of PS4’s fastest selling exclusives - Robert Ramsey @ Pushsqaure
00:24:10 - Super Mario Maker 2 gets a Super Mario Makeover - Nintendo Press Release
00:33:59 - Do you think there was even more content (besides SMB2) that was planned? Or was the original plan always to have these 3 major updates? - Best Friends Q:The 5 Star Man
00:39:35 - Nintendo is investigating reports of accounts being breached - Tom Phillips @ EuroGamer
00:42:00 - There’s a butt load of new Animal Crossing content coming - Nintendo Press Release
00:46:35 - Death Stranding PC is delayed - Kojima Productions Twitter
00:47:40 - Out today
00:50:40 -  BROOKLINEN
00:52:00 - EXPRESS VPN
Reader mail   -
00:57:50 - With the credible rumors of Sony showing their new controller because it would otherwise have leaked, are we not at a point where surely there must be a PS5 prototype that similarly could leak? - MalcontentRonin
00:59:50 - REQUIRED READING: Here are some pets to make your day better Brendain
https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2020-04-21-here-are-some-pets-to-make-your-day-better - Sinclair @ GIBiz
01:01:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
